title: Ed Miliband – 2021 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy Secretary, in Brighton on 26 September 2021.
content:
Friends it’s great to be back. Last time I spoke to you I was leader of our party.
